# groupingType

**Instance Property**

The grouping for collections retrieved with the media query.

## Declaration

```swift
var groupingType: MPMediaGrouping { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default grouping type is [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaGrouping/title]. See [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaGrouping] for the list of available grouping types.

## Configuring media queries

- **filterPredicates**: The media property predicates of the media query.
- **addFilterPredicate(_:)**: Adds a media property predicate to a query.
- **removeFilterPredicate(_:)**: Removes a filter predicate from a query.
- **itemSections**: An array representing the section grouping of the query’s specified media items.
- **collectionSections**: An array representing the section grouping of the query’s specified media item collections.
- **MPMediaGrouping**: Keys used to configure a media query.
